creator: jesse.glick@netbeans.com
text:
Should be self-explanatory.

Leaving the current sentence "NetBeans has very good Ant integration indeed" for
your judgement. Probably unless you are going to back up such qualifiers with
detailed feature comparisons etc., it would be better and fairer to use more
neutral language.

patch applied, thanks.

I'll leave the "very good indeed" part to whoever has put it into the document in
the first place.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
